headline: 2 Beaten-Down Dividend Stocks You Can Buy Right Now
summary: The S&P 500 remains close to correction territory, and there are some excellent bargains to be found in the stock market right now.  Empire State Realty Trust (NYSE: ESRT) is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that owns a portfolio of office, retail, and residential real estate in New York City, including the iconic Empire State Building.  First, this is a highly profitable business and despite the common perception that offices are largely sitting empty right now, Empire State's office portfolio is 93.5% leased.
